response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your business operations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand it's worth $800,000 to you. As such, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my commitment to ensuring you receive the best possible deal. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction.", "product_price": 750000}
